datafield.subfield: The video was digitized from its original recording as part of the CERN Digital Memory project

1. Gauge invariance and Feynman rules for QCD. 2. Renormalization, running coupling and operator product expansion. 3. QCD in $e^{+] e^{-}$ collisions: from quarks and gluons to hadrons; R, jets and shape variables. 4. QCD in lepton-hadron collisions: DIS structure functions, sum rules and parton evolution. 5. QCD in hadron-hadron collisions: DY, W and Z production, Jets, heavy quarks.
An introduction to some basic aspects and concepts of the QCD
